template.name: MergerV2
template.parameter: const belt_t belt, const pos_t pos, const belt_t other

template.name: StationV2
TailSensorV2
FlowV2
template.parameter: const belt_t belt, const pos_t pos, const belt_t other, const int policy

template.name: Belt
Initializer
HeadSensorV2

query.formula: Pr [<=1000; 100] ([] Initializer.init_over imply exists(i : station_t) StationV2(i).waiting and Belt.check_deadlock(StationV2(i).input()) or exists(j: station_t) StationV2(j).error or Flow.error)
query.comment: Eventually the system will incur in a deadlock state where, since the belt is no longer moving pieces, the stations start to load more than one piece onto the same segment or no station is fed with a new piece

query.formula: Pr [<=1000; 100] ([] Initializer.init_over imply (sum(x : station_t) not StationV2(x).waiting) + (sum(i : belt_t ) sum(j : belt_pos_t) belts[i][j]?1:0) == sum(k : belt_t) belt_conf[k].pieces)
query.comment: For all paths, once initilized, the pieces in the system remain the same, so no station is containing more than 1 piece and each segment has at most one piece

query.formula: Pr [<=1000; 100] ([] Initializer.init_over imply forall(i : belt_t) forall(j : belt_pos_t) 0 <= belts[i][j] < 2)
query.comment: For all paths the segments of the belt hold only one piece

query.formula: Pr [<=1000; 100] ([] Initializer.init_over imply forall(i : belt_t) ((sum(j : belt_pos_t) belts[i][j])<=Belt.max_queue(i)))
query.comment: For all paths the pieces on the belts are within the queue length once the system in initialized
For all paths the Flow component throw an error
For all paths all the stations reach the error state

query.formula: Pr [<=1000; 100] ([] Initializer.init_over imply forall(i : station_t) not StationV2(i).waiting imply belts[StationV2(i).input()][0] == 0)
query.comment: For all paths if station is processing no piece can reach it
In order: - total pieces in the system - pieces on belt - pieces being processed

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=1.25, bucket count=5 Runs: 10 in total, 10 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [10, 15] Mean estimate of displayed sample: 12 ± 0.9538 (95% CI)
